description.default: Azure Databricks is a fast, easy, and collaborative Apache Spark-based big data analytics service designed for data science and data engineering.

overview.title: Azure Databricks Private Authentication Shared Service
overview.description: Long form description of the workspace service, in markdown syntax
overview.default:
The Azure Databricks Lakehouse Platform provides a unified set of tools for building, deploying, sharing, and maintaining enterprise-grade data solutions at scale.
Azure Databricks integrates with cloud storage and security in your cloud account, and manages and deploys cloud infrastructure on your behalf.
[Azure Databricks documentation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/databricks/introduction/)
